overview: In-Flight Service is the work of none other than the After Hours Collector's good buddy Charles Lamont (better known to 60s sexploitation fanatics as C. Davis Smith). A pure product of the infamous Kirtman Studios and an off-kilter example of Gotham-born grindfare. It follows the erotic adventures of two red-blooded roommates - an airline hostess and an exotic dancer.
title: In-Flight Service
